au_192702: mv ~ /dev/null

$ sudo adduser test
$ sudo usermod -aG sudo test

$ sudo su test  # we are now running as test but let's check
$ cd ~; pwd
/home/test

$ sudo mv ~ /dev/null 
mv: cannot overwrite non-directory ‘/dev/null’ with directory ‘/home/test’

sudo mv file /dev/null

$ sudo umount /mnt/fd

$ dd if=<(printf "\xf0\xff") of=floppy_144.img \
bs=1c obs=1c count=2c seek=516c conv=notrunc

$ dd if=<(printf "\xf0\xff") of=floppy_144.img \
bs=1c obs=1c count=2c seek=5124c conv=notrunc
